label: that's where her lady fiona disappeared!

first_translate: I can feel a great evil.
second_translate: I can definitely sense a great evil.
label: I can sense a great evil.

first_translate: it’s so terrifying that I can’t even look at it!
second_translate: So terrifying that even looking at it is frightening...!
label: I'm afraid to even look at it...!

hangle: 그래도 피오나를 구할 수 있는 방법은 하나뿐이야.
first_translate: but there’s only one way to save fiona.
second_translate: But there’s only one way to save Fiona.
label: still, there's only one way to save fiona.

first_translate: I’ll have to break through the darkness.
second_translate: I will break through that darkness.
label: I must go into the darkness.

first_translate: aren’t you afraid of losing your life, siegren?
second_translate: Don't you value your life, Siegren?
label: don't you fear for your life, siegren?

second_translate: I don’t care about that at all.
label: I don't care about anything else.

hangle: 저 어둠에 잠시 틈을 내는 것 정도는 할 수 있겠지?
first_translate: you can create a small opening in the darkness, right?
second_translate: You can create a temporary opening in the darkness, right?
label: do you think you could create an opening in the darkness?
do it now! open the way!

first_translate: create an opening in the darkness!
second_translate: Create an opening in the darkness!
label: ...and create an opening!

first_translate: why are we dressed like this?
label: this gown...

second_translate: Have you come to your senses?
label: are you awake?

hangle: 분명 어둠에 있던 무언가를 상대하고 있었던 것 같은데.
first_translate: I was fighting something in the darkness.
second_translate: I think I was dealing with something in the darkness.
label: I was clearly facing something in the darkness.

hangle: 왜 정신을 차리니 옷 벗은 너랑 누워 있는 거야.
first_translate: why am I lying in bed with you, and why are you naked?
second_translate: Why do I wake up to find myself lying with you, and why are you naked?
label: when I came to, I found myself lying here next to you half-naked.

first_translate: I thought I died and went to heaven.
second_translate: I thought I had died and gone to heaven.
label: I thought I had died and gone to heaven.

second_translate: You made everyone worry so much.
label: how could you say that...

second_translate: Is that really what you have to say…?!
label: ...after worrying me half to death...?!

first_translate: an emergency tent in the forest.
second_translate: A temporary camp set up in the forest.
label: inside a makeshift shelter in the forest.

hangle: 본부 쪽은 어둠이 와서 초토화가 되었으니까.
first_translate: the darkness destroyed the base camp.
second_translate: The base camp was completely devastated when the darkness came.
label: darkness descended upon our base and destroyed it.

hangle: 네 몸이 너무 안 좋아서, 당장 영주의 성으로 이동할 수가 없었어.
first_translate: you were in such bad shape that we couldn’t move you to the lord’s castle.
second_translate: Your condition was too bad to move you to the lord’s castle right away.
label: we couldn't take you to a feudal castle because you seemed to be in critical condition.

hangle: 다른 사람들은 모두 무사하니까 걱정하지 마.
first_translate: everyone else is safe, so don’t worry.
second_translate: Everyone else is safe, so don’t worry.
label: everyone else is fine, so don't worry.

first_translate: what are you doing? lie down and rest some more.
second_translate: What are you doing? Lie down and rest some more.
label: what are you doing? you should lie back down.

hangle: 날 구하기 위해서 다른 사람들이 얼마나 고생했을지,
first_translate: I want to know how much trouble everyone went through to save me...
second_translate: I wonder how much everyone struggled to save me.
label: I need to see how everyone is after trying to save me,

hangle: 내가 어둠 속에서 본 게 뭔지…
first_translate: ...and what I saw in the darkness.
second_translate: What I saw in the darkness...
label: and I need to find out about what I saw in the darkness.

first_translate: I want to go find out right now.
second_translate: I want to go find out right now.
label: I have a lot of questions that need to be answered.

second_translate: You need absolute rest for now.
label: right now, you need to get some rest.

hangle: 알고 있어. 실은 돌아다닐 힘도 없다고.
first_translate: I know. I don’t even have the strength to walk around.
second_translate: I know. Actually, I don't even have the strength to walk around.
label: I know. I don't even have the energy to go out, anyway.

hangle: 그래도 꼭 하고 싶은 게 하나 있어.
first_translate: but there’s one thing I want to do.
second_translate: But there's one thing I really want to do.
label: but there’s something I really want to do.
it seems like you were crying,
so I'd like to give you a hug.
...reminds me of when he was a kid.

first_translate: it reminds me of the past.
second_translate: This reminds me of the past.
label: the good old days...

second_translate: I feel like I’m going crazy because of you.
label: you're driving me crazy...

first_translate: a city near the affected area
second_translate: A city near the affected region.
label: we arrived at a city near the affected area.

first_translate: I was so worried that something had happened to you.
second_translate: I was really worried that something might have gone wrong.
label: I was so worried something might have happened to you.

first_translate: you were in a coma, and your body temperature was low.
second_translate: Not only were you in a coma, but your body temperature was also low.
label: you were in a coma, and your body temperature was dangerously low.

second_translate: What matters is that I’m safe.
label: well, as long as I'm okay now...

first_translate: do you think his grace and prince siegren will feel the same way?
second_translate: Would his lordship and Prince Siegren think the same way?
label: do you think duke heylon and prince siegren would feel the same?

second_translate: Please keep it a secret from His Grace...
label: please don't say anything about this to the duke...

hangle: 주군께 감히 비밀을 만들 수는 없죠.
first_translate: we can’t keep secrets from our lord.
second_translate: We can’t possibly keep secrets from our lord.
label: you know I can't keep secrets from his grace.

hangle: 그 후에 다른 사람들에게 감사 인사를 잔뜩 받았다.
first_translate: I received a lot of thanks from everyone afterward.
second_translate: After that, I received many words of gratitude from others.
label: many people came to thank me after that day.

hangle: 아카데미 연구원들은 물론이고, 엑스트라 기사들도 날 찾아왔었지.
first_translate: not only the academy researchers but also the extra knights came to see me.
second_translate: Not only the academy researchers but also the extra knights came to see me.
label: not only academy researchers, but even soldiers and knights came to extend their gratitude.

hangle: 영지의 주인인 렐턴 후작도 우리를 환대하며
first_translate: marquess relton, the owner of the territory, also welcomed us...
second_translate: Marquess Relton, the lord of the territory, also welcomed us...
label: even marquess relton, the leader of the region, gave us a warm welcome...

hangle: 이번 일로 유니스의 힘에 가능성이 있다는 것도 확인했으니,
first_translate: we also confirmed that eunice’s power has potential,
second_translate: We also confirmed that Eunice's power has potential through this incident.
label: and since I got to see the potential in eunice's powers,

hangle: 일이 꽤 잘 풀렸다 할 수 있겠어.
first_translate: so I’d say things turned out pretty well.
second_translate: So I’d say things turned out pretty well.
label: I can say that this incident worked out pretty well.

first_translate: on the way to the marquess’s manor
second_translate: On the way to the marquis's manor.
label: en route to the marquess's manor

first_translate: there are still many unanswered questions.
second_translate: There are still many unanswered questions.
label: there’s still a question that’s unanswered...

hangle: 어둠 속의 그 사람은 대체 누구일까?
first_translate: who was that person in the darkness?
second_translate: Who was that person in the darkness?
label: who was that in the darkness?

second_translate: Does the darkness create hallucinations too?
label: does the darkness make you hallucinate...?

first_translate: I can’t find an answer no matter how much I think about it.
second_translate: No matter how much I think about it, the answer just won’t come to me.
label: no matter how hard I try to wrap my head around it, I can't seem to find an answer.
there's another thing I'm wondering about.

first_translate: right before I was sucked into the darkness,
second_translate: right before I was sucked into the darkness,
label: before I got sucked into the darkness,

first_translate: it was only for a moment,
second_translate: It was only for a moment,
label: it was only for a second,

first_translate: but I was able to stop the darkness from coming.
second_translate: I was able to stop the darkness from approaching.
label: but I was able to stop the darkness from coming closer.
...I have the power to control the darkness?
